column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : Is there a continent you have n't played where you would like to ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=We have never been to South America .
#Text=Brazil
#Text=.
#Text=DS : Rio or São Paulo ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=I ca n't remember , I think people — I 'd love to go to Rio , but friends who have played in Brazil have said that shows are amazing everywhere .
#Text=DS : How has the Iraq War affected you as an artist ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=Not too much , directly , to be honest .
#Text=The process of recording music , for me , is very insular .
#Text=I 'm just recording at home and it 's very much headspace music .
#Text=I 'm escaping and I 'm not a social commentarian or anything .
#Text=It 's more about escaping into this world of sound in my head .
#Text=I do n't think it 's affected the business of us touring or anything at all .
#Text=DS : Has it affected you as a person ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=I 'm an opponent of the war and I live in the UK where I live under a government that has taken troops to the war or whatever .
#Text=It has n't changed my perspective that much where I feel there have been lots of terrible situations like this in the past and you just have to do whatever is in your power .
#Text=I was at the big march in London .
#Text=Use your vote and protest in whatever ways you can , but I have n't dropped everything in my life and drastically changed my life .
#Text=DS : Do you find you 're more inspired by manmade things or things in nature ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=I think manmade things , but specifically ideas .
#Text=I 'm not interested in things in the real world as much as I am interested in mental ideas and mental contexts .
#Text=That 's why I did a PhD in Pure Maths , this elegance of pure ideas and things that are somewhat intangible and about ideas .
#Text=Music is very much like that , playing around with ideas and creating this aesthetic of sound .
#Text=DS : What sort of ideas inspire you ?
#Text=Caribou :
#Text=In mathematics at the PhD level when I was studying was about constructing these elaborate systems and concepts , playing around with them , and fitting them together .
#Text=More than ideas is playing around with the ideas , constructing them , and creating something out of them .
#Text=For example , in music I will have an idea to put some different sounds together or a melody that meshes with a chord sequence or a sonic mood , or whatever .
#Text=I 'm not the type of person who takes physical things apart and plays around with them , but I like taking mental ideas apart and playing around with them .
#Text=That 's what appeals to me about what I 've spent my life doing .
